means: （因热力，严寒、干燥、年老等而）枯萎，皱缩

sentence.Network_en: Get the bulbs into the ground, or they will begin to shrivel.
sentence.Network_cn: 把鳞茎种到地里, 否则会开始干枯的.

sentence.Network_en: The leaves started to shrivel up.
Then their seed ripens, and soon they turn brown and shrivel up.
sentence.Network_cn: 随后,它们的种子熟了, 不久就变枯萎.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... unravel 解开，拆散 shrivel （使）皱缩，干涸，枯萎  hovel 茅舍，肮脏的小屋.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... unravel 解开，拆散 shrivel （使）皱缩，干涸，枯萎  hovel 茅舍，肮脏的小屋.
Ca-reduplication - 免费文档下载 ... 狐臭 body odor from the 萎缩,绉纹 shrivel,wrinkled 收缩,缩成一团 shrink.
harry potter 我征服阅读的第一步读书笔记 ... ... dull 阴暗的迟钝的 Shrivel 褶皱束手无策 Trembled 颤抖.

list.abs: To wither or shrivel or mature imperfectly ., 枯萎枯萎 , 萎缩或发育不良.
in the long drought , the leaves shriveled up and died., 由于久旱 , 树叶都枯萎而死了.
shrivel 皱缩；萎缩；收缩；超皱；枯萎shrivelled apple 干缩苹果shroud 胴体包布
in fact , the butterfly spent rest of its life crawling with a swollen body and shriveled wings .事实上，蝴蝶的余生就只能靠肿胀的身体和萎缩的翅膀爬行了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: perhaps of Scandinavian origin; compare with Swedish dialect skryvla 'to wrinkle'

entry.def: When something shrivels or when something shrivels it, it becomes dryer and smaller, often with lines in its surface, as a result of losing the water it contains.

example.ex: ...dry weather that shrivelled this summer's crops.
example.tran: 造成今夏作物枯萎的干旱天气

means.word_mean: 1. wither, especially with a loss of moisture;
2. decrease in size, range, or extent;

sentences.sentence: "My courage shrivelled when I saw the task before me"

auth_sentence.content: In extreme cases plants shrivel up and die.
auth_sentence.res_content: In extreme cases plants shrivel up and die.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In extreme cases plants shrivel up and die.

auth_sentence.content: Keep an eye on the berries, you don't want them to shrivel.
auth_sentence.res_content: Keep an eye on the berries, you don't want them to shrivel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Keep an eye on the berries, you don't want them to shrivel.

auth_sentence.content: Its profits were supposed to shrivel between slumping domestic demand and soaring foreign obligations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its profits were supposed to shrivel between slumping domestic demand and soaring foreign obligations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its profits were supposed to shrivel between slumping domestic demand and soaring foreign obligations.
